song.title: The Stand
song.lyrics:
[1] .G You stood before creation .C Eternity in Your hand .G/B Em You spoke the earth into motion . C My soul now to stand
[2] .G You stood before my failure . C And carried the cross for my shame . G/B Em My sin weighed upon Your shoulders . C My soul now to stand
[P] . C Am So what can I say . Em And what could I do . C D But offer this heart O God . Em G Completely to You --- [3] . G So I'll walk upon salvation . C Your Spirit alive in me . G/B Em This life to declare Your promise . C My soul now to stand
[C] .C G So I'll stand . D Em C With arms high and heart abandoned . G D Em C In awe of the One who gave it all || . G I'll stand . D Em My soul Lord to You surrendered .C G D Em All I am is Yours
